name: Gate Wrapped BTC
description: GTBTC(Gate Wrapped BTC) GTBTC is an on-chain BTC yield-generating asset issued by Gate Web3, backed by Gateâ€˜s BTC reserves and wrapped as a standardized on-chain Token. Users can stake BTC on Gate Staking to mint GTBTC, with yields automatically accumulated in the form of net asset growth during the holding period. GTBTC is suitable for both CeFi and DeFi scenarios, balancing yield and liquidity.
